features: Lightweight comfort: The natural, lightweight fabric is soft with merrow®-stitch seams for maximum comfort and minimum chafing
Odor & moisture management: Made from bamboo charcoal, this tee is great at evacuating sweat and odors, keeping you fresh and dry
Outdoor versatility: Ideal for all your outdoor activities from trail races to hiking
Bamboo Charcoal: Bamboo is an environmentally functional material featuring excellent absorption properties for better breathability, drying time and odor control
